title: Expand satellite map to 90% screen coverage on click

requirements.text: When the satellite map column is clicked, expand it to cover 90% of the screen width while collapsing the other two columns to share the remaining 10%

quotes: staellite map should be cover 90 of scrre when i click on it

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the map column expands it to 90% screen width
Other two columns are collapsed to share 10% total width
Clicking the map again or clicking another column restores the default layout
Transition is smooth and matches existing column expansion behavior

constraints: Maintain existing click-to-expand functionality for all three columns
Preserve mobile-optimized map controls and touch interactions
nonGoals: Changing the default collapsed state of columns
Modifying map rendering or tile loading logic
Adding new map features or layers
